findings.title: Integer Overflow/Underflow
findings.description: TEAL arithmetic functions always fail due to overflow/underflow, leading to logic errors including contracts that always fail.

findings.title: Arithmetic Precision Errors
findings.description: TEAL arithmetic does not have sub-integer precision; logic errors could occur due to accumulated rounding error from the division operation.

findings.title: Access Control: Function Visibility
findings.description: TEAL logic used to restrict access to certain functions may contain errors which could lead to privilege escalation.

findings.title: Typographical Errors in README
findings.description: The audit report identified several typographical errors in the README file, including incorrect type listings, duplicate identifiers, and inaccurate descriptions of code paths.
